## Individual Pages: 

### Steps:

1. Please add your analyses to your corresponding `.Rmd` file in the analysis folder.
2. Taking turns, pull from GitHub, keeping changes to your corresponding `.Rmd` file.
3. Push your changes to GitHub.
4. If multiple people have added dependencies in the `DESCRIPTION` file, everyone should copy and paste one instance with all dependencies into their own copy before doing above steps!
